attributes.action: Stop making the British homeless and making them live on the streets
attributes.additional_details: As it’s not fair the British people should be made to live out on the streets it’s not there fault that we are over populated here and something needs to be done about it this needs ending people deserve somewhere to live there targeting the men which is a disgrace
attributes.background: Stop the British living in the streets and stop making them homeless when they have paid there tax

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may also wish to sign this petition which calls for the Government to provide affordable housing: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706105
